remarks.format: ## Remarks 基架是用于生成基于数据库架构的 web 页模板的机制。Scaffolding is the mechanism for generating web page templates based on database schemas. ASP.NET 动态数据使用基架来生成基于 Web 的用户界面，可让用户能够查看和更新数据库。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses scaffolding to generate Web-based UI that lets a user to view and update a database. 此类使用属性来启用基架的各个表中动态数据网站。This class uses the property to enable scaffolding of individual tables in a Dynamic Data Web Site. 基架动态显示基于数据模型不需要的物理页面的页面，从而增强了 ASP.NET 页框架。Scaffolding enhances the ASP.NET page framework by dynamically displaying pages based on the data model with no physical pages required. 基架提供以下功能：Scaffolding provides the following: - 最小或没有代码，以创建数据驱动的 Web 应用程序。Minimal or no code to create a data-driven Web application. - 缩短开发时间。Quick development time. - 完全正常运行，包括显示、 插入、 编辑、 删除、 排序和分页功能的页面。Pages that are fully functional, including display, insert, edit, delete, sorting, and paging functionalities. - 基于数据库架构的内置数据验证。Built-in data validation based on the database schema. - 创建的筛选器针对每个外键或布尔字段。Filters that are created for each foreign key or Boolean fields. 此类可以用于启用或禁用通过将此特性应用到该分部类表示表的数据模型中的数据表的基架。This class can be used to enable or disable scaffolding of data tables in a data model by applying this attribute to the partial class that represents the table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过将基架特性应用于表示错误日志表的错误日志部分类隐藏 AdventureWorksLT 数据库中的错误日志表。The following code example hides the ErrorLog Table in AdventureWorksLT database by applying the scaffold attribute to the ErrorLog partial class that represents the ErrorLog table. 基架属性设置为 `false.`The scaffold property is set to `false.` ```csharp [MetadataType (typeof(ErrorLogMetada))] [ScaffoldTable(false)] public partial class ErrorLog { } public class ErrorLogMetada { } ``` ```vb _ Public Partial Class ErrorLog End Class Public Class ErrorLogMetada End Class ``` 若要编译该示例代码，你需要以下各项：To compile the example code, you need the following: - Visual Studio 2008 Service Pack 1 或 Visual 开发人员 2008 Express Edition Service Pack 1。Visual Studio 2008 Service Pack 1 or Visual Developer 2008 Express Edition Service Pack 1. - AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 有关如何下载和安装 SQL Server 示例数据库的信息，请参阅[Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例： 数据库](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases)GitHub 上。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 请确保安装版本的正在运行的 SQL Server 示例数据库的正确版本。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - 动态数据网站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 这可用于创建数据库和包含要自定义的数据字段的类和要重写的方法的数据上下文。This enables you to create a data context for the database and the class that contains the data field to customize and the methods to override. 此外，它将创建要在其中使用上述页面的环境。In addition, it creates the environment in which to use the page described before. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 创建一个新动态数据网站使用基架](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a).
